long_description: The Osprey Quantum daypack helps you pull off your day-long activity in comfort and style, whether you're touring the city or exploring the wilderness. Airscape(TM)-style back panel with ridged foam padding provides cushion and ventilation; well-padded shoulder straps are covered with spacer mesh. Removable 20mm webbing waist strap; sternum strap with whistle buckle. Panel-loading main compartment has a multifunction, bottom-padded sleeve; it holds up to a 15.4 in.laptop or a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Also includes a document sleeve, MP3 pocket and zippered mesh storage pocket. Large front stash pocket with key fob keeps everyday gear sorted and close at hand; includes inner mesh stash pocket. 2 side stretch-mesh pocket; single ice axe loop provides a place to lash on tools. Front stretch shove-it pocket with quick-release buckle closure allows quick stashing. Padded top grab handle adds a convenient way to carry the pack the Osprey Quantum daypack.
short_description: The Osprey Quantum daypack helps you pull off your day-long activity in comfort and style, whether you're touring the city or exploring the wilderness.
